name: PhaseShifter
description:
PhaseShifter is a free-to-play competitive 2D platformer. Showcase your ability to be the quickest by blazing through a variety of levels.

Gameplay

The core element of PhaseShifter is your ability to change which platforms you can pass through or stand on. If you want to reach the end of a level faster, you will need to be aware of your 'phase' state and think about timing your changes correctly.

The only way to Pass a level is to reach the end before the rank timer runs out. The game will give you a score at the end of each successful session, ranging from S to D ranks. Achieving a rank higher than D will grant you a Clear, while achieving an S rank will grant Mastery.

Leaderboards

All official levels are given a leaderboard, and your best time on them is automatically submitted and showcased when playing online. These best times can be watched back at any time, meaning it is possible to learn about other players strategy, or refine your own.

Global ranking

Our ranking system rewards players with points based on the time they achieved on each level. These points are used to determine your place in the rankings.

Level editor and custom levels

With the level editor, you can design your own levels and share them with fellow players.

If you wish to have your level evaluated and possibly included in the official levels list, fill out this form.
